section.label: A.2.1
section.title: CR Image IOD Description
section.para: The Computed Radiography (CR) Image Information Object Definition specifies an image that has been created by a computed radiography imaging device.

note.para: Digital Luminescence Radiography is an equivalent term for computed Radiography.

section.label: A.2.2
section.title: CR Image IOD Entity-Relationship Model
section.para: This IOD uses the E-R Model in, with only the Image IE below the Series IE. The Frame of Reference IE is not a component of this IOD.

section.label: A.2.3
section.title: CR Image IOD Module Table
section.para: specifies the Modules of the CR Image IOD.

td.para: C - Required if contrast media was used in this image

note.para:
The
was previously included in the Image IE for this IOD but has been retired. See PS3.3-2004.

section.label: A.3.1
section.title: CT Image IOD Description
section.para: The Computed Tomography (CT) Image Information Object Definition (IOD) specifies an image that has been created by a computed tomography imaging device.

section.label: A.3.2
section.title: CT Image IOD Entity-Relationship Model
section.para: This IOD uses the E-R Model in, with only the Image IE below the Series IE.

section.label: A.3.3
section.title: CT Image IOD Module Table
section.para: specifies the Modules of the CT Image IOD.

td.para: C - Required if time synchronization was applied.
C - Required if contrast media was used in this image
C - Required if Multi-energy CT Acquisition (0018,9361) is YES.

section.label: A.3.3.1
section.title: CT Image IOD Content Constraints
section.para: If Multi-energy CT Acquisition (0018,9361) is YES the following constraints will apply:

listitem.para:
The
shall be present if contrast was administered even if images are processed to remove contrast information from the pixels, e.g. Virtual Non-Contrast images.
The Real World Value Mapping Sequence (0040,9096) shall be present in the.

For Measurement Units Code Sequence (0040,08EA) in the Real World Value Mapping Sequence (0040,9096) D
shall be used.
